code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Filters=_ref=>{let{onFilterChange}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[albumTitle,setAlbumTitle]=useState('');const[userEmail,setUserEmail]=useState('');const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();onFilterChange({title,albumTitle,userEmail});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Photo Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Album Title",value:albumTitle,onChange:e=>setAlbumTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"User Email",value:userEmail,onChange:e=>setUserEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Apply Filters"})]});};export default Filters;
